XOR_COMPARE_STOP


load seven in 01
load seven in 10
load 255 in 1111
move 01 to A
move 10 to B
ALU XOR A and B
move ALU to 11
jump to DISP if Equals Flag
else end
:DISP
move 1111 to display
end

0001 LDA 0001 00000111
0010 LDA 0010 00000111
0011 LDA 1111 11111111
0100 MVA 0001 00000000
0101 MVB 0010 00000000
0110 ALU 0110 00000000
0111 MVR 0011 00000000
1000 JMF 0001 00001010
1001 HAL 0000 00000000
1010 MVD 1111 00000000
1011 HAL 0000 00000000

0001 0001 0001 00000111
0010 0001 0010 00000111
0011 0001 1111 11111111
0100 1001 0001 00000000
0101 1010 0010 00000000
0110 0010 0110 00000000
0111 1011 0011 00000000
1000 1101 0001 00001010
1001 1111 0000 00000000
1010 0011 1111 00000000
1011 1111 0000 00000000
